data.message: i had a message from Whalen Michelle Lee stating i had won a lottery; please confirm[hopefully] or be aware of this scam if not already informed; i didnt give any information

replies.message: Hi Daniel. This sounds like a spam message. Please report this message as spam by going to the conversation, opening the Actions menu and selecting 'Report as Spam or Abuse'. Thank you for taking the time to keep Facebook a safe and welcoming environment. -Sidney
